conclusion: The electromotive force of the power source E = 3V and the internal resistance r = 0.5Ω.
From the U - I graph of R1, R1 = 0.5Ω. From the U - I graph of R2, R2 = 1Ω.
When the external resistance R = r, the output power of the power source reaches its maximum.

premise: The internal resistance r = 0.5Ω and R1 = 0.5Ω, R2 = 1Ω.
conclusion: R1 = r, so connecting R1 alone maximizes the power source output efficiency.
